titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z50: Ketubah d'irkhesa, 1893.

notesStmt.note: This document is a replacement for a lost ketubbah. The couple was married two years earlier, on Elul 11, 5657. Their original ketubbah is preserved in the library: see KET Z 49.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
